wk8projdwyerm

Class AmusementParkTester

  • java.lang.Object
    • wk8projdwyerm.AmusementParkTester

  • public class AmusementParkTester
extends java.lang.Object
    AmusementParkTester class provides the home for testing the AmusementPark class, which also utilizes the Merchandise and Ticket classes. Within this class, an AmusementPark object is created, and all methods of the AmusementPark class are utilized and tested.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AmusementParkTester()

      Main method controls the flow of the program including menu-based testing loop
      static void testBuyMerchandise(AmusementPark park)
      The testBuyMerchandise(AmusementPark park) method utilizes the buyMerchandise(long id) method of the AmusementPark class, changing the purchase status on the merchandise item identified if it was available for sale.
      static void testBuyTicket(AmusementPark park)
      The testBuyTicket(AmusementPark park) method utilizes the buyTicket(long id) method of the AmusementPark class, changing the purchase status on the ticket identified if it was available for sale.
      static void testGetMerchandise(AmusementPark park)
      The testGetMerchandise(AmusementPark park) method produces an inventory listing from the merchandise ArrayList attribute of an AmusementPark object park
      static void testGetMerchandiseLong(AmusementPark park)
      The testGetMerchandiseLong(long id) method produces an inventory item from the merchandise ArrayList attribute of an AmusementPark object park using the selected item id and the instance method getMerchandise(long id)
      static void testGetMerchandiseString(AmusementPark park)
      The testGetMerchandiseString(AmusementPark park) method produces an inventory listing from the merchandise ArrayList attribute of an AmusementPark object park using the selected category name and the instance method getMerchandise(String category)
      static void testGetName(AmusementPark park)
      The testGetName() method produces the output of invoking the AmusementPark method getName()

      The testGetTicketDates(AmusementPark park) method produces an ArrayList of dates using the getTicketDates(Date date) method from the AmusementPark class
      static void testGetTicketLong(AmusementPark park)
      The testGetTicketLong(AmusementPark park) method retrieves a Merchandise object using the getTicket(long id) method from the AmusementPark class
      static void testGetTickets(AmusementPark park)
      The testGetTickets(AmusementPark park) method produces an integer of the number of tickets available on a specified date : getTickets(Date date)
      static void testGetTicketsArray(AmusementPark park)
      The testGetTicketsArray() method provides testing for the getTickets() method in the AmusementPark class

      • addTicketInventory

        public static void addTicketInventory(AmusementPark park)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        The addTicketInventory(AmusementPark park) method imports tickets from a csv text file provided for testing purposes. All tickets are added to the AmusementPark object using the addTicket() instance method from the AmusementPark class. The ticket holder name is set to "Walden Amusement Park" and the purchaseStatus attribute is set to false for all new items.
        Parameters:
        park - : AmusementPark object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - : Text file import for inventory

      • addMerchandiseInventory

        public static void addMerchandiseInventory(AmusementPark park)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        The addMerchandiseInventory(AmusementPark park) method imports merchandise items from a csv text file provided for testing purposes. All items are added to the AmusementPark object park using the addMerchandise(Merchandise m) instance method from the AmusementPark class. The inStock attribute is set to true for all new items.
        Parameters:
        park - : AmusementPark object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - : Text file imported for inventory
